All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    ArrayManipulator
    This class contains class methods used to manipulate arrays.
    Battle
    This class represents a battle, where a player battles against an entity.
    Command
    This enum contains commands expected to be available for use for the player during gameplay.
    Consumable
    This class represents a skeleton of an item expected to be consumed by the player.
    Door
    This class represents a door which holds attributes such as its position (direction), if the door is locked or not, if the door leads to an exit.
    Dragon
    This class represents an enemy monster which is a dragon.
    DragonTreasure
    Sets up the game by creating rooms with different attributes such as doors, items etc.; asks the user of their current environment (IDE or UNIX terminal / Windows CMD) and prompts the user for a player name.
    Dungeon
    This class handles the player navigation and the core gameplay (apart from the monster battles) as well as the UI related to the gameplay.
    Entity
    Represents an entity in the game with various attributes expected to be inherited by non-abstract classes.
    Grenade
    This class represents an explosive weapon, a grenade used by an entity during battle to cause damage on the attacked entity.
    HealthPotion
    This class represents one type of consumable expected to be consumed by the player, a health potion.
    Item
    This class represents a skeleton for game-items.
    K
    Contains constant values used in the game.
    Key
    This class represents a key used by the player to open doors or gain access to pass through them.
    Keyring
    This class represents an item which is a collection of none to many keys.
    Kitten
    This class represents a specific treasure, a kitten, which the player can pick up.
    Main
    The sole purpose of this class this is to start the program.
    Monster
    This class represents an enemy in the game, which is some kind of monster.
    Player
    This class represents a player-entity with which the user navigates through the game layout and engages in battles with.
    Printable
    This interface is implemented on classes which are expected to print art or information, about the class which implements this interface.
    PrintCollection
    This class contains methods utilized to print various visual effects.
    Room
    This class represents one room.
    SaltaPinnar
    This class represents a specific treasure, salty sticks, which the player can pick up.
    Sword
    This class represents a sword, a weapon used by an entity.
    TimeManipulator
    This class contains class methods used to control time-related events.
    Treasure
    This class represents a treasure which the player can find and collect.
    ValueManager
    This class takes care of managing values such as position strings and direction characters by generating different types of output.
    ValueManager.InvalidDirectionException  
    VisualEffectManager
    This class represents a manager expected to be utilized for managing visual effects.
    Weapon
    This class represents a skeleton used to identify and specify attributes for an item which is a weapon used by an entity.
